abstract: Yes, President Obama is pushing for the 2016 Summer Olympics to be held Chicago, but Rio de Janeiro is the city that can best afford it.
snippet: Yes, President Obama is pushing for the 2016 Summer Olympics to be held Chicago, but Rio de Janeiro is the city that can best afford it.
lead_paragraph: Will it be Chicago, Madrid, Rio de Janeiro or Tokyo? The grandees of the International Olympic Committee will announce the location of the 2016 Summer Olympics on Friday evening in Copenhagen. But in this contest, most of the bidders stand to lose more than they stand to gain.

headline.main: The Smart Choice for Olympic Host
headline.print_headline: The Smart Choice for Olympic Host

byline.original: By Constantine Courcoulas and George Hay
